subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Melky Cabrera could not corral Nick Punto’s double with one out in the 12th inning, sending the Oakland Athletics to a 1-0 victory over the Toronto Blue Jays on Friday.
snippet: Melky Cabrera could not corral Nick Punto’s double with one out in the 12th inning, sending the Oakland Athletics to a 1-0 victory over the Toronto Blue Jays on Friday.
